attributes.action: readable print for an aging population.
attributes.additional_details: Because of advances in computer graphics, print on labels and packaging has become smaller and is often in colours which are harder to read, ( e.g. yellow on white ). The population is aging and because of this print should be getting larger and easier to read. This is not only irritating, it's dangerous. There should be standards of clarity for print on all packaging.

rejection.details: Unfortunately, this isn't something the Government can enforce.
